name: Stainless Steel Clothes Drying Rack – Adjustable Gullwing and Foldable for Easy Storage – Rust-Proof for Indoor and Outdoor Use
short_description: Original Cresnel brand with improved quality. High grade stainless-steel that resist rusting designed for indoor and outdoor use. Expansive top planar area of 58” x 24” provides generous drying area for typical household wash load. Hang dry your laundry onto the multiple rails or with hanger for larger load. Bottom rack for shoes and slippers. Weight approximately 6 lb it can be moved from indoor to outdoor or room to room easily. When not in used, it is foldable into flat rectangular shape of 40” x 24” x 3” for easy storage. Comes fully assembled, no tools required. Just expand the rack into “A” shape and flip up the left/right panel and it is ready for drying. Long-term electric bill saving from utilizing this drying rack pays for the rack itself. Good for wallet and good for environment.
product_description: Unlike typical painted steel or chrome plated rack, this rack is made of high grade stainless-steel. It can be used both indoor and outdoor with rust resistance. Its versatile foldable design allows easy storage without taking up spaces.

short_description: [Storage Aplenty] This 15.9"D x 35.8"W x 62.2"H metal clothes rack serves as an extension of your closet, adding tons of hanging space to keep up to 40 shirts in order [Sturdy and Durable] 25.4 mm dia. steel tubes connected by screws make a sturdy clothing rack that holds up to 88 lb and gives your heavy clothes stable support for years to come [With Storage Shelf] The bottom mesh shelf holds up to 22 lb, making it perfect for your shoes and storage boxes. The mesh is closely spaced, so even your high heels can find a place here [Easy to Move] 4 universal casters, including 2 with brakes, make it easy for you to move this garment rack from your bedroom to your coatroom and lock it in place as you need [Easy to Assemble] Labeled parts and illustrated instructions allow you to easily set up this clothes rack with wheels so you can quickly have more space to tidy up your clothes

name: SONGMICS Clothes Drying Rack, Foldable 2-Level Laundry Drying Rack, Free-Standing Laundry Airer, with Height-Adjustable Wings, 33 Drying Rails, Sock Clips, Silver and Blue ULLR53BUV1
short_description: 4 Wings, 33 Rails, Multiplied Space: With 4 wings in 2 layers for a total of 33 rails, this clothes drying rack offers you tons of space to dry your clothes, towels, and blankets, perfect for those who want to dry lots of clothes at once 27 Clips for Socks and More: The 27 clips come in handy when you need to dry your socks, underwear, tank tops, and other accessories, freeing you from the annoyances of lightweight clothes falling to the ground Adjustable Wings for Clothes of Varying Lengths: The top 2 wings of this drying rack can be adjusted to 3 heights (from the floor: 41.9'', 50.5'', and 64.3'') to fit different clothes. Pants, skirts, sheets, shirts...everything will find its own space! No Assembly, Hassle-Free to Move & Store: No assembly is needed to get this laundry rack ready. Just open it up to use! And it's easy to fold the rack up to transport it to the laundry room or the patio, or stash it under your bed to save space Water and Rust-Resistant: Boasting thick steel tubes with a specially treated finish and durable plastic connectors, this laundry drying rack is water and rust-resistant. So feel free to hang your wet laundry on!

name: Honey-Can-Do DRY-09065 Collapsible Clothes Drying Rack Steel
short_description: Steel Generous Drying Space for Everyday Laundry – With 24 linear feet of drying room, this laundry drying rack provides ample space to air-dry clothing, towels, a must-have laundry accessories. Gentle & Protective for Delicate Fabrics – The coated steel frame ensures a snag-free surface, making this clothing drying rack and towel rack ideal for preserving delicate materials while allowing proper air circulation. Space-Saving Foldable Design for Easy Storage – Folds down to just 3 inches, this clothes drying rack and collapsible clothing rack tucks neatly into closets, laundry rooms, or small spaces. Durable Steel Build for Long-Term Use – Crafted from high-quality steel, this clothes rack offers exceptional strength and stability, making it perfect collapsible clothing rack for drying heavy garments and everyday essentials. Versatile for Indoor & Outdoor Drying – Whether in a laundry room or outside on a patio, this laundry rack ensure efficient drying in any environment. Compact Yet Spacious for Everyday Laundry Needs – Measuring 29” L x 14” W x 42” H, this laundry drying rack collapsible offers ample drying space while saving room, making it a perfect portable dryer for apartments.
product_description: Upgrade your laundry routine with the Honey-Can-Do Collapsible Laundry Drying Rack, a perfect combination of durability, efficiency, and space-saving design. Featuring 24 linear feet of drying space, this laundry drying rack allows clothes, towels, and delicate fabrics to air-dry naturally, reducing wrinkles and extending fabric life. Built from high-quality steel, it delivers reliable support for heavy items while maintaining a lightweight frame. Ideal for compact spaces, this portable dryer for apartments conveniently folds down to just 3 inches, making storage effortless in closets or laundry rooms. Whether you need an indoor drying rack or an outdoor clothes drying rack, its versatile design adapts to any environment. Measuring 29” L x 14” W x 42” H, it maximizes drying capacity while maintaining a sleek, space-efficient footprint. Ditch bulky drying methods and embrace an sustainable solution with this must-have laundry accessories!

name: SONGMICS Clothes Drying Rack, with Sock Clips, Metal Laundry Rack, Foldable, Space-Saving, Free-Standing Airer, with 2 Height-Adjustable Gullwings, Indoor Outdoor Use, Silver and White ULLR052W01
short_description: Stainless Steel Tubes, Pp Plastic [All-in-One Drying Solution] The 24 hanging rods offer ample space for clothes, towels, and blankets, making it ideal for those who need to dry large loads in one go. Its lightweight design makes it a breeze to transport and position wherever you need it [Easy-Peasy Assembly] No screws are required. With numbered parts and step-by-step instructions, you'll be able to put together your laundry rack quickly and easily [Rust-Resistant & Heavy-Duty] Boasting thick steel tubes with a specially treated finish and durable plastic connectors, this clothes drying rack is capable of holding up to 55 lb. You won't have to worry about it buckling or rusting over time

name: Minky Homecare 3 Tier Plus Indoor and Outdoor Portable Clothes Drying Rack - Collapsible Laundry Air Dryer with 69 ft. of Hanging Space - Silver
short_description: INDOOR & OUTDOOR - This high-quality clothes drying rack is perfect for indoor and outdoor use. Air drying laundry reduces household power usage and extends the lifespan of your garments. EXTRA STRONG FRAME - The tubular steel frame remains safe and stable even when fully loaded with up to 44 lb. of wet laundry or two whole wash loads. EASY TO USE - Opens in seconds with the double-sided auto lock mechanism clicking securely into position making it quick and easy to open. EXTENDED DRYING SPACE - Offers 69 ft. of hanging space - 49 ft. of rung drying space plus four convenient flip-out corners that hold 12 extra-long hanging items. LIGHTWEIGHT AND SPACE SAVING – The sturdy yet lightweight steel construction makes setup and teardown a breeze. When not in use, the drying rack simply folds away in seconds for complete compact storage.
product_description: Designed for optimal drying performance, the Minky 3 Tier Plus Indoor and Outdoor Clothes Drying Rack opens in seconds and offers 69 ft. of hanging space: 49 ft. of rung drying space plus four convenient flip-out corners that hold 12 hanging items. The wide rungs optimize airflow for quicker drying and the extra strong tubular steel construction ensures it remains stable even when fully loaded with wet laundry, holding up to 46 lb. of weight. The double-sided auto-lock mechanism clicks securely into position making it easy to open, load and close. The non-slip feet give extra stability and prevent damage to floors. When not in use, the rack folds away neatly for storage. Dimensions when open: 55.5 x 27.2 x 20 in. Dimensions when closed: 30.3 x 24 x 2.4 in. *Take care with delicate fabrics; it is recommended to hang delicate garments on hangers from the flip out corners. Take care when placing and removing garments.

product_description: Maximize your laundry organization with the Honey-Can-Do Collapsible Clothing Rack, a perfect solution for drying clothes indoors or outdoors. Designed for small spaces, this foldable-clothes drying rack easily collapses for compact storage, making it ideal for apartments, laundry rooms, dorms, and even travel. With a portable dryers for laundry design, this lightweight yet durable clothes dryer rack can be moved effortlessly between rooms or placed on a balcony or patio. Made from sturdy steel, it holds up to 50 lbs., offering ample space to hang shirts, pants, towels, and delicate garments. Its sleek silver finish blends with any decor while keeping your laundry area tidy. This energy-saving alternative to electric dryers helps reduce wear and tear on clothes, extending their lifespan while lowering utility costs. Whether you need extra drying space for everyday laundry, delicate fabrics, or even pasta, this collapsible clothing rack is a must-have. Easy to set up, store, and transport, the Honey-Can-Do clothes dryer rack offers a practical, space-saving, and eco-friendly drying solution. Keep your clothes fresh, your space organized, and your laundry routine efficient with this versatile drying rack.
